name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.
schedule:
Week 1 (9/12): Introduction to the course, the basic elements of a researched paper

Week 2 (9/19): Review the organization of an essay: introduction, body paragraphs and conclusion, review the concepts of unity and coherence

Week 3 (9/26): How to use sources

Week 4 (10/3): Comparison-and-contrast essays: in-class discussion and lecture

Week 5 (10/10): National Holiday

Week:6 (10/17): Discussion of students' topic and thesis statement
             Discussion of a selected article (The Silence of the Lambs & American Psycho)

Week 7 (10/24): Cause-and-effect essays: in-class activity and lecture
             
Week 8 (10/31): Discussion of a selected article (The Ring)
              
Week 9 (11/7): Discussion of students’ topics and thesis statements

Week 10 (11/14): Argumentative essays: in-class activity and lecture 
               
Week 12 (11/21): Argumentative essays: in-class activity

Week 13 (11/28): Discussion of a selected article

Week 14 (12/5): Discussion of students’ topics and thesis statements
 
Week 15 (12/12): Review 

Week 16 (12/19): Review 

Week 17 (1/2): Film viewing

Week 18 (1/9): Final review & exercise
